Name: 
Lê Duy Hoàng. 
Date of birth: 
02/08/1993. 
University: 
University of Sciences. 
Address: 
106 Trần Nhân Tôn, P.2, Q.10, HCM. 
Email:  hoangld.dev@gmail.com 
Skype: hoangld_dev. 
Current position:
Senior Software Engineer. 
Phone:
0963 246 516. 
About: 
➢Over 6 years develop mobile application (5+ years working, 1 year training). 
➢Build and maintain over 20 apps (10+ apps build from beginning) for many clients and companies. 
➢Good at single working with contribute 40%-100% projects. 
➢Good at researching for every complex problems even there are little informations on internet. 
➢Adapt as well every business, model, framework,... and make it better. 
➢Respect The Truth - Easy Way - Easy Rule - Must Real Value. 
Study Process: 
➢2011 - 2015: Complete bachelor of science in software engineering - University of Sciences. 
➢2013 - 2014: Complete basic and advanced mobile development courses. 
Experience ​ : 
➢Mobile development: 
▪
Android: 
9/10. (5+ years). 
▪
IOS: 
7/10. (1.5+ years). 
▪
Ionic, React native:
6/10. (6 months). 
➢ Language:  
▪
Java:
9/10. (5+ years) 
▪
Kotlin:
7/10. (6+ months) 
▪
HTML/CSS/Javascript: 
6/10. (6 months) 
▪
Objective C, Swift: 
7/10. (1.5+ years) 
▪
C, C++, C#: 
5/10. (6 months) 
➢Web development: 
▪
PHP (Laravel, Slim): 
5/10. (6 months) 
▪
.Net: 
5/10. (6 months) 
Nashtech (7/2019 - 9/2019) 
Description: ImagineMIC Doctor gives individuals the ability to communicate with a nurse or physician in 
real-time, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. Using the latest Telehealth technology, this 
application provides an enhanced level of oversight which promotes optimal wellness in the home, creating 
peace of mind for family, friends, and caregivers. 
Project:
Imagine Mic 
Position: 
Senior Software Engineer. 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=edu.marist.monitormedoctor 
Tools:
Android studio, Xcode, Jira, Git 
Responsibilities:
Maintain and develop both Android and IOS apps by do some features to support 
doctor can communicate, observe, take care their patients away 
Methodology:
Agile Scrum. 
Technical: 
Android, iOS ,FCM, Twilio, Socket IO. 
ZaloPay (4/2019 - 7/2019) 
Description: In particular, you can transfer money easily, quickly, without charge and absolutely safe, 
transfer inter-bank money via card / account and transfer money via ZaloPay wallet 
Support management and payment of bills; Buy phone cards, buy movie tickets, airline tickets, pay credit 
cards on ZaloPay application. 
Pay quickly, conveniently for Electricity, Water, Internet and Television thanks to the automatic saving of 
customer codes, automatic prompt payment every period, monthly expense statistics, easy spending 
management. 
Obtain the highest level of PCI DSS security certification and apply outstanding security technology such 
as: not storing card information, security with payment passwords and fingerprints, etc. Obtained by the 
State Bank of Vietnam licensing and operational management. 
Position: 
Software Engineer. 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vn.com.vng.zalopay 
Tools:
Android studio, Zeplin, CI/CD, Gitlab, LabelImg, Jupyter,... 
Responsibilities:
Maintain and develop some features make app have good performance and more 
security. Research new technology to apply for smart payment, refactor and improve 
architecture for base source 
Technical: 
Activity, Fragment, Intent, JobIntentService, Dagger, Rx-Android, RX-Kotlin, Kotlin, 
Gson, Retrofit, MVP, PowerMock, Clean Architect, ZXing, Camera, Image classification,  
Object detection, Tensorflow, Python, Mobilenet, R-CNN,... 
Streamy (2/2018 – 3/2019) 
Description: Streamy support user find event and join by buy the ticket on app and website. User can 
create a event and sell the ticket on, looking for events around by searching. In beside that, Streamy is a 
social app too, user can connect with others by using app like: Facebook, Instagram,... by features: find 
friend, add friend, chat, create story, live streaming,... 
Position: 
Senior Android developer. 
Link ​ : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.live.streamy 
Tools:
Android studio, Zeplin, Trello 
Responsibilities:
Ensure Streamy Android application is created and have great operation. 
Technical: 
Wowza cloud service, Wowza Gocoder, edit photo, edit video (FFmpeg), Intent 
Service, Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Facebook SDK, Javascript interface 
for SVG seat map, Firebase, FCM, Fabric, RX-Android, Android annotation, Retrofit, 
                                Dagger, MVP, Material design,... 
FPT Software (5/2014 – 7/2014 and 9/2016 – 2/2017) 
Position: 
Senior Android developer 
Project: 
Alermo, DirectTV App (DVR), Pill Reminder, OTT,… 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.alermo 
                                https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.directv.dvrscheduler 
                                https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bayer.ph.Horadelapildora 
Client: 
RaKuten, DirectTV, Bayer. 
Responsibilities: Get requirement -> Confirm requirement -> estimate tasks -> confirm manager/client  
-> Coding -> testing -> release (Alpha) -> QA -> maintenance -> release (Beta). 
Technical: 
Sliding menu, pull to refresh, load more, Asynctask, Viewpager, streaming, video 
player, SQlite, 
data binding, event bus, Task-schedule, Activity, Fragment, Intent, Broadcast receiver, 
Service, MVVM 
Company: ISB VietNam (09/ 2014 – 12/2015) 
Address: 
Unit 3.1, Etown 2, 364 Cong Hoa St, Tan Binh Dist., Ho Chi Minh.
Position: 
Software engineer (Android). 
Project: 
IWnn-IME (Keyboard), Prospex (Smart watch) 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.omronsoft.wnnlab 
Client: 
Sonny, Docomo, Omron, Panasonic, Seiko. 
Tools: 
Android studio, Git, Jira. 
Responsibilities: Get requirement -> Confirm requirement -> estimate tasks -> confirm manager/client  
-> Coding -> testing -> release (Alpha) -> QA -> maintenance -> release (Beta). 
Technical: 
Input service, Plugin, Software-hardware keyboard, emotion icon, animation, SQlite, 
Bluetooth low energy, Activity, Intent, Fragment, Google Map, Service, Alarm 
manager, Service, Notification. 
Freelancer – Remote – Service Provider. 
10/2017 – 2/2018  
Company: HHD Group. (Viet Nam) 
Responsibility: Build warehouse app - real estate and property for sale app (Android, IOS). 
Position: Mobile developer (Technical software support). 
Tools: Android studio, Xcode, Git, Jira. 
Technical: Android, IOS, Ionic, React native, PHP, OCR (Text recognition), Voip (Call center service), 
Video call conference 
08/2017 – 10/2017:  
Company: CodeNinja Pte, InfinityCore, IBSV. (Singapore, Japan) 
Responsibility: Build E – Commerce project, POS app (PHP, Android). 
Position: Web and Mobile developer. 
Tools: Android studio, Sublime, Git, Jira. 
Technical: Android, Laravel, Slim framework. 
03/2017 – 07/2017:  
Company: Originally US 
Responsibility: Build Smart POS app (Android, IOS). 
Position: Senior mobile developer 
Tools: Android studio, Xcode, Git, Jira. 
Technical: Activity, Intent Service, Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Facebook SDK, Firebase, FCM, 
Fabric, RecycleView, RX-Android, Android annotation, Retrofit, Dagger, MVP, Material Design, Butterknife, 
CocoaTouch, Cocoapods, Auto layout, AFNetworking, AlamoFire, Rest API, Zxing, AVFoundation, 
QRcode, SwiftyJson. 
03/2016 – 08/2016:  
Company: Averspace, Krowdpop (Singapore, Korea, USA). 
Responsibility: Build property for sale and Fan & Fund apps - International (Android, IOS). 
Position: Senior mobile developer 
Tools: Android studio, Xcode, Git, Jira. 
Technical: Activity, Intent Service, Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Facebook SDK, Firebase, FCM, 
Fabric, RecycleView, RX-Android, Android annotation, Retrofit, Dagger, MVP, Material Design, Butterknife, 
CocoaTouch, Cocoapods, Auto layout, AFNetworking, AlamoFire, Rest API, SwiftyJson 
10/2015 – 02/2016:  
Company: Md24 Housecall (USA). 
Responsibility: Build Global telemedicine app – USA & Asian (Android). 
Position: Android developer 
Tools: Android studio, Git, Jira. 
Technical: Activity, Intent Service, Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Facebook SDK, Firebase, FCM, 
Google Service, HealthVault SDK.
